title: New Epic skin: God Staff Jax

replies.body: when can i buy this skin {{sticker:sg-janna}}  I've been waiting for so long to buy this thing and then the patch rolls around and i still cant buy it
This happens with all skins, after the patch releases it takes a couple days for the skin to be in store due to processing.

i feel like riot miss an opportunity here. this should be an ultimate skin and it would be well received. to me this feels underwhelming. i am almost as disappointed with this skin as i was when they released Baker Pantheon skin, another missed opportunity for a great skin.
for now ill stick to my mighty jax skin
It’s not even an epic skin lol

To all the people who already bought this skin, go to your skin collection and check it, you will find this skin is not an epic one in your collection though  it is 1350 RP. Idk if riot mess up with this or just me. Hope they could fix this soon.
